title: Computational Systems Neurobiology
description: Models of neural coding and computation in the olfactory, visual, auditory, and somatosensory systems. Models of the motor system including central pattern generators, reinforcement learning, and motor cortex. Models of memory systems including working memory, long-term memory, and memory consolidation. Enrollment restricted to MS students only in the following major code: BI84, BI87. This course and BGGN 251 are taught in alternate years. May be coscheduled with BIPN 147.
